response.overview: A film by Nathan Anderson that explores the current debate over the intersection of faith and politics, Postmillennialism, christian nationalism, and the duty of rulers to submit to Christ.  Synopsis: The debate over faith and politics has grown more pointed in recent years, terms like “christian nationalism” and “theocracy” seem to be constantly on the lips of news pundits and politicians, especially since the rise of Donald Trump. As bible believing Christians it seems like an important time to ask questions like: What does the bible teach about the intersection of faith and politics? And what does it look like for rulers to honor and obey the son?  Featuring: Douglas Wilson, Vishal Mangalwadi, Chocolate Knox, Joe Morecraft, Joe Boot, Luke Pierson, Jason Garwood, Ricardo Davis, Toby Sumpter, P. Andrew Sandlin, Joel Webbon, C.R. Wiley

response.title: Honor the Son
